article: indonesia 's most wanted terrorist was being interrogated wednesday following his weekend arrest , police said , accusing him of involvement in the #### bali bombings and several other deadly strikes in the world 's most populous muslim nation .
abstract: indonesian police question alleged leader of southeast asian terror network
